text.thaumaturge.strange_dreams.touched_: Your fingers tingle strangely as you handle the crystal. What does that mean? Maybe some rest will inspire you.
text.thaumaturge.strange_dreams.grant_bo: You awaken from a strange dream. You quickly write it down before the memory fades.
book.thaumaturge.strange_dreams.name: Strange Dreams
book.thaumaturge.strange_dreams.page_1: I had the strangest dream last night. In the dream I took three of those shard crystals I found and ground them with a handful of redstone in a bowl using a piece of flint. If I did it properly then the result was a strange, glowing dust.
book.thaumaturge.strange_dreams.page_2: In the dream I took the dust and sprinkled it on a bookcase, but the dream ended before I saw what happened. I wonder, should I do what the dream showed? I have the impression the dust was going to reveal something wondrous, but dangerous.
block.thaumaturge.vessel.full: Arcane saturation reached - vessel cannot bear further essence
block.thaumaturge.vessel.recipe_failed: Aspect imbalance - the synthesis collapses into inert materia
